course.title: MAT 5133 Partial Differential Equations I (3 units)
course.desc: First-order equations, characteristics method, classification of second-order equations, separation of variables, Green's functions. Lp and Soboloev spaces, distributions, variational formulation and weak solutions, Lax-Milgram theorem, Galerkin approximation. Parabolic PDes. Wave equations, hyperbolic systems, nonlinear PDes, reaction diffusion equations, infinite-dimensional dynamical systems, regularity. This course is equivalent to MATH 5406 at Carleton University.Course Component: LecturePermission of the Department is required.
